DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Efficacy Safety cover self-expandable dual-layered metallic mesh stent ( UVENTA ) ureteral obstruction .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Covered Self-expandable Dual-layered Metallic Mesh Stent ( UVENTA ) Ureteral Obstruction
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , Multi-center , open label , single arm Study 1 . Treatment - Covered self-expandable dual-layered metallic mesh Stents ( cSEMS ) implant patent malignant ureteral obstruction 2 . Follow - Assessments include X-ray ( KUB ) , do 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 24 month procedure . - Diuretic RI scan ( DTPA , MAG-3 ) 3 , 6 , 12 month procedure - Imaging IVP ( Intravenous Pyelogram ) , ultrasonogram , CT ( Computed Tomogram ) perform 6 12 month .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients voluntarily agree participation submit write inform consent study , 20~80 year 2 . One follow case apply Patients malignant ureteral obstruction benign ureteral obstruction without improvement previous treatment Patients n't want regular replacement plastic stent Patients improvement obstruction plastic stent implant Patients want Urinary diversion stimulatory sign pain due plastic stent 3 . Patients previous ureteral metal stenting procedure experience . 4 . Patients 6 month life expectancy 5 . Patients understand objective study willing sign consent 1 . Patients Urothelial Carcinoma 2 . Patients bladder invasion malignant tumor 3 . Patients bladder dysfunction obstruction lower urinary tract 4. one time Recurrent Urinary stone last 3 year 5 . 2 time upper urinary tract infection without upper urinary tract obstruction 6 . Karnofsky score < 60 7 . Patients Bacteriuria 8 . Inadequate Patient participate study judge investigator
